frontmatter.author: miracleJude
frontmatter.title: Build a Blog with Astro and Hoola AI Headless CMS
frontmatter.description: Astro is an open-source web framework that enables developers to build blazing-fast websites and applications. It does this by compiling everything to HTML, so little to no JavaScript is sent to the client by default. Here's a guide to building with Hoola AI Headless CMS and Astro.
